item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 18, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Scripton – Python IDE with Built-In Realtime Visualizations (27 points | 4 comments)
2. Show HN: Live-updating version of the 'What a week, huh?' meme (477 points | 92 comments)
3. Grok3 Launch [video] (361 points | 640 comments)

5. My washing machine refreshed my thinking on software estimation (286 points | 254 comments)
6. Plane crashes, overturns during landing at Toronto airport (434 points | 486 comments)
7. I helped fix sleep-wake hangs on Linux with AMD GPUs (685 points | 185 comments)
8. 670nm red light exposure improved aged mitochondrial function, colour vision (227 points | 130 comments)
9. Reviewing the Cryptography Used by Signal (77 points | 34 comments)

12. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring Mongo/React/Node Engineers ( | hide)

22. The Generative AI Con (223 points | 254 comments)
23. You're not a senior engineer until you've worked on a legacy project (2023) (706 points | 393 comments)
24. Why Quantum Cryptanalysis is Bollocks [pdf] (106 points | 77 comments)

26. Find Your 2%Ers (2023) (123 points | 34 comments)
27. Spacetime maps: A map that warps to show travel time (141 points | 24 comments)
28. NES86 – IBM PC Emulator for the NES (112 points | 26 comments)
29. Show HN: Welcome, Cot: the Rust web framework for lazy developers (49 points | 49 comments)
30. Show HN: Sober Ringtones – Cringe-free ringtones for people who hate ringtones (8 points | discuss)
